code: import{authenticationService}from'_services';export var handleResponse=function handleResponse(response){return response.text().then(function(text){var data=text&&JSON.parse(text);if(!response.ok){if([401,403].indexOf(response.status)!==-1){authenticationService.logout();window.location.reload(true);}var error=data&&data.message||response.statusText;return Promise.reject(error);}return data;});};
